solution_line_template: Of the colored paper, Barbara removed {num_bundles_colored} * {sheets_per_bundle} = <<{num_bundles_colored}*{sheets_per_bundle}={colored_sheets}>>{colored_sheets} sheets of paper.
Of the white paper, she removed {num_bunches_white} * {sheets_per_bunch} = <<{num_bunches_white}*{sheets_per_bunch}={white_sheets}>>{white_sheets} sheets of paper.
Of the scrap paper, she removed {num_heaps_scrap} * {sheets_per_heap} = <<{num_heaps_scrap}*{sheets_per_heap}={scrap_sheets}>>{scrap_sheets} sheets of paper.
So in total, Barbara removed {colored_sheets} + {white_sheets} + {scrap_sheets} = <<{colored_sheets}+{white_sheets}+{scrap_sheets}={total_sheets}>>{total_sheets} sheets of paper.
